scripts._build: npm run browserify; npm run cp; npm run readme; npm run data:repo
scripts.cp:metadata: npm run cp:metadata:bower.json; npm run cp:metadata:package.json
scripts.data:repo: for repo in $(npm run repos); do wget -N https://api.github.com/repos/fibo/$repo -O _data/repos/$repo.json; done
scripts.#data:repo: for repo in algebra algebra-group algebra-ring dflow .software flow-view games-of-life gh-clone home iper Perl-Box-pm Sweet-Home-pm Task-BeLike-FIBO-pm vvvv-ChaosToys; do wget -N https://api.github.com/repos/fibo/$repo -O _data/repos/$repo.json; done
scripts.readme: npm run readme:get; npm run readme:cat
scripts.readme:get: for repo in dotsoftware gh-clone nz-util tris3d; do npm run readme:get:$repo; done
scripts.readme:cat: for repo in dotsoftware gh-clone nz-util; do npm run readme:cat:$repo; done
scripts.repos: for repo in algebra algebra-group algebra-ring dflow .software flow-view games-of-life gh-clone home iper Perl-Box-pm Sweet-Home-pm Task-BeLike-FIBO-pm vvvv-ChaosToys; do echo $repo; done
